title: 'The love I felt today was incredible, thank you so much' - Carter
summary: England defender Jess Carter tells BBC Sport that she "couldn't be more grateful" for the support she has received after she had been the target of racist abuse during Euro 2025.

title: Hosts Morocco into Wafcon final after shootout win over Ghana
summary: Morocco will face Nigeria in the final of Wafcon 2024 after beating Ghana 4-2 on penalties following a 1-1 draw in Rabat.
